sentences.en: A range of ointments and creams is available for the treatment of eczema.
sentences.cn: 有一系列治疗湿疹的油膏和乳膏可以买到。

sentences.en: Across birth cohorts, the rate of eczema and rhinitis remained stable.
sentences.cn: 横向比较同界出生人口, 湿疹和鼻炎的发病率保持稳定.

sentences.en: Better still, though, would be to work out what aspect of modern life causes eczema.
sentences.cn: 但是更好的办法是弄清楚现代生活的哪些方面会引起湿疹。

sentences.en: ConclusionThe cream has good effects on neurodermatitics, chronic eczema, itch and psorcasis.
sentences.cn: 结论该制剂对神经性皮炎 、 性湿疹 、 屑病、肤瘙痒等有良好疗效.

sentences.en: Eczema almost always begins in childhood, usually during infancy.
sentences.cn: 湿疹几乎总是发生于儿童, 通常在幼年时期.

sentences.en: Eczema is a common skin complaint which often runs in families.
sentences.cn: 湿疹是一种常见的皮肤病，通常具遗传性。

sentences.en: For eczema, wet sore, itchy skin, leprosy, as scabies ringworm.
sentences.cn: 用于湿疹 、 湿疮 、 皮肤瘙痒 、 疥癣麻风等.

sentences.en: He grew out of his eczema as he got older.
He has a simplistic view of the treatment of eczema.
sentences.cn: 他对湿疹治疗的看法过于简单化。

sentences.en: How can ability treat the chronic eczema on ace?
sentences.cn: 怎么样才可以治好手上的慢性的湿疹?

sentences.en: It's a chicken and egg situation. Does the deficiency lead to the eczema or has the eczema led to certain deficiencies?
sentences.cn: 这是个鸡和蛋的问题。是因为营养缺乏导致湿疹呢，还是湿疹导致了某些营养缺乏？

sentences.en: Objective To study the relationship of newborn eczema and mold infection.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨霉菌感染与新生儿红臀的关系.

sentences.en: Systemic eczema is strange extremely urticant, how to effect a radical cure?
sentences.cn: 全身湿疹奇痒难耐, 怎么根治?

sentences.en: The term " eczema " has had many meanings.
sentences.cn: “ 湿疹 ” 这个名词有过许多意思.

sentences.en: The treatment of eczema in children, essentially the same as infantile eczema.
sentences.cn: 儿童湿疹的治疗, 基本上与婴儿湿疹相同.

sentences.en: There are those who think eczema is catching.
sentences.cn: 有人就是认为湿疹会传染。

sentences.en: To get the most out of your eczema treatment, use it exactly as your doctor prescribes.
sentences.cn: 为达到湿疹治疗的最佳效果，应该照着医生开出的处方去做。

trans.tran_en: a condition in which your skin becomes dry, red, and swollen
